titleStmt.title: Objections to Mr. Lowndes's proposal about the amendment of our coin·

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Hodgkin, and are to be sold by John Whitlock, in Stationer's Court, near Amen-Corner,

notesStmt.note: The text and register are continuous, despite the pagination.
A reply to William Lowndes's 'A report containing an essay for the amendment of the silver coins', London, 1695.
Reproduction of the original at the Glasgow University Library.
